data.comment: Today's referee, Daniel Siebert, has blown to start the match.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Frankfurt to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
In Augsburg, Frankfurt push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Daniel Siebert signals a Augsburg throw-in in Frankfurt's half.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Augsburg.
Frankfurt have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Throw-in for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
Daniel Siebert awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Daniel Siebert signals a throw-in for Frankfurt, close to Augsburg's area.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
In the minute 10, Florian Niederlechner gets his shot on target but fails to score for Augsburg.
Important block from the Augsburg defence as Andre Silva fires in a strike for Frankfurt.
Andre Silva for Frankfurt gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 12, Daniel Siebert awards Augsburg a goal kick.
Augsburg's Rani Khedira gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
In the minute 15, Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at WWK ARENA.
Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, Filip Kostic for Frankfurt drives towards goal at WWK ARENA. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Erik Durm (Frankfurt) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 18, Daniel Siebert awards Augsburg a goal kick.
Augsburg's Alfred Finnbogason gets in a shot on goal at WWK ARENA. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in high up the field for Frankfurt in Augsburg.
In the minute 20, Can Frankfurt capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Augsburg's half?
Throw-in Augsburg.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Augsburg.
In the minute 22, Frankfurt have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in the half of Augsburg.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Frankfurt close to the penalty box.
Daniel Siebert awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Augsburg.
In the minute 24, Free kick Augsburg.
Filip Kostic (Frankfurt) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
In the minute 28, In Augsburg Augsburg drive forward through Alfred Finnbogason. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Augsburg's Florian Niederlechner misses with an attempt on goal.
Frankfurt have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
In Augsburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 30, Djibril Sow (Frankfurt) gets a yellow card.
Augsburg advance rapidly upfield but Daniel Siebert blows for offside.
Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
In the minute 34, In Augsburg, Filip Kostic (Frankfurt) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of Augsburg.
In the minute 36, Frankfurt needs to be cautious. Augsburg have an attacking throw-in.
In Augsburg Augsburg attack through Daniel Caligiuri. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Augsburg.
In the minute 37, Frankfurt's Erik Durm fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Daniel Siebert awards Augsburg a goal kick.
Frankfurt are coming forward and Andre Silva gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Frankfurt are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
Daniel Siebert signals a Frankfurt throw-in in Augsburg's half.
In the minute 43, Frankfurt's Amin Younes is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Augsburg.
Frankfurt are pushing forward but Amin Younes's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Augsburg have a goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway in Augsburg.
In the minute 46, Alfred Finnbogason of Augsburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Augsburg.
Throw-in for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Frankfurt drives forward and Filip Kostic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
In the minute 49, Augsburg needs to be cautious. Frankfurt have an attacking throw-in.
Augsburg pushes forward through Marco Richter, whose finish on goal is saved.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Frankfurt.
In the minute 51, Tuta (Frankfurt) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Augsburg have a goal kick.
Rani Khedira is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 53, Frankfurt to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
Augsburg’s Rani Khedira is on his feet again at WWK ARENA.
An unfortunate own goal by Raphael Framberger makes the score 0-1.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Frankfurt at WWK ARENA.
Throw-in Frankfurt.
Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, At WWK ARENA, Aymen Barkok has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Daniel Siebert awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Daniel Siebert awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 63, Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
Daniel Siebert awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Frankfurt at WWK ARENA.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Heiko Herrlich (Augsburg) is making a first substitution, with Ruben Vargas replacing Florian Niederlechner.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Sebastian Rode (Frankfurt) gets booked by Daniel Siebert, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Free kick Augsburg.
Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Frankfurt.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 70, Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
The away team replace Sebastian Rode with Stefan Ilsanker.
Corner awarded to Augsburg.
Amin Younes of Frankfurt smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 72, Martin Hinteregger is booked for the away team.
Augsburg's Marco Richter breaks free at WWK ARENA. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
Throw-in Augsburg.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Frankfurt to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
The away team have replaced Amin Younes with Bas Dost. This is the second substitution made today by Adi Hutter.
Frankfurt make their third substitution with Steven Zuber replacing Andre Silva.
Daniel Siebert signals a throw-in for Augsburg, close to Frankfurt's area.
In the minute 77, Ajdin Hrustic is on a sub for Aymen Barkok for Frankfurt.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Tobias Strobl is replacing Iago for the home team.
In the minute 78, Augsburg make their third substitution with Michael Gregoritsch replacing Carlos Gruezo.
Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Frankfurt are caught offside.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Frankfurt at WWK ARENA.
Throw-in for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Augsburg.
In the minute 83, Michael Gregoritsch (Augsburg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at WWK ARENA.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
Daniel Siebert awards the away team a throw-in.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Goal! Frankfurt extend their lead to 0-2 through Stefan Ilsanker.
That's a fine assist from Steven Zuber.
Adi Hutter is making the team's fifth substitution at WWK ARENA with Timothy Chandler replacing Filip Kostic.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 89, Daniel Caligiuri (Augsburg) has received a yellow card from Daniel Siebert.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Augsburg.
Frankfurt push upfield but Daniel Siebert quickly pulls them for offside.
Marco Richter (Augsburg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Augsburg push forward at WWK ARENA and Michael Gregoritsch gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Frankfurt defence.
Frankfurt have a goal kick.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
Augsburg are coming forward and Michael Gregoritsch gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Daniel Siebert awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
